findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is marked as external and has no access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.description: The transfer function has a vulnerability.

findings.description: The transferFrom function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.description: The permit function has a critical vulnerability.

findings.description: The mint function is declared as External and has no access modifier, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens has a potential vulnerability due to supporting fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks due to its interaction with tokens that have a fee on transfer.

findings.title: Unprotected Function 'distributeTokenDividends'
findings.description: The function 'distributeTokenDividends' is declared as public and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized users to distribute token dividends.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend Function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is public and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.
